Why the fuck are threads like http://avicus.net/forums/525c60938 locked for scamming?

If they don't give credit just give a warning, but a lock and even a webban is just pure bullshit, especially since the people who made it are outside of avicus.

also, if you're gonna lock this, at least let there be a debate first.
